description.p:
This addon implements the opened platform called Open Toutatice (which one is based on the Nuxeo DM distribution)
Main evolutions: * Upgrade to be compliant with the Nuxeo version 5.8 * New worfkflow automation operations : accept or refuse a workflow * webpage : portalsite & portalpage have a new schema "regions" for inheritances and layout of the regions in portal * webpage : new fragments : list of links & zoom * New document automation operation to add a new entry in a complex list * New service to add extra informations in FetchPublicationInfos
Main fixes provided: * webpage : icon selector component work both in back office and portal views, default icons displayed if thumbnail displayed
